Your local friend:

Amaranta

About:

Amaranta is a self-taught photographer based in Bali.

Always curious and with a camera, that's how Amaranta describes herself, she is a digital nomad, yoga teacher and curious traveler based in Bali.

Course Details:

Location: Bali, Indonesia

Duration: 1 day

Level: Beginner

What you'll learn:

Where we'll be:

What I'll provide:

I will teach you how to take awesome photos in some of the most iconic locations in Bali.

Good to know
